DynamicTokens.Name: success
DynamicTokens.Value: Hey sweetie! I saw the queen of sauce today and I had to try it out. I made some for you so enjoy! $h

DynamicTokens.Name: success
DynamicTokens.Value: Hey sweetie! I've cooked you something I learned from the Queen of Sauce long ago... enjoy! $h

DynamicTokens.Name: success
DynamicTokens.Value: Almost forgot... I saw the queen of sauce today and I had to try it out. I made some for you so enjoy!

DynamicTokens.Name: success
DynamicTokens.Value: I've also cooked you something that I've learned last year from the Queen of Sauce! Enjoy!

DynamicTokens.Name: failure
DynamicTokens.Value: Sorry for the burnt smell... I was trying a recipe from the Queen of Sauce and it didn't go well. Here's some coffee instead... hope it's enough. $s

DynamicTokens.Name: failure
DynamicTokens.Value: Sorry for the burnt smell... I was trying a recipe from the Queen of Sauce and it didn't go well. Maybe you can put the remains to use. $s

DynamicTokens.Name: festival
DynamicTokens.Value: By the way... are you going to enter the fishing contest tomorrow?

DynamicTokens.Name: festival
DynamicTokens.Value: Thanks for a great year @. I'm excited to tackle next year together. Please accept this to celebrate! $h

Entries.Sat1: Oh, hello. Sorry, I'm tired... was playing Journey of the Prairie King all night $neutral
Entries.Sat4: Hello @, I was playing Journey of the Prairie King all night and still couldn't defeat the first level myself $neutral#$e#Anyways, hope you're doing well...
Entries.Sat6: Maybe I'm getting addicted playing Journey of the Prairie King. I'll probably do better if I take a break from it... hmm, Jumino Kart sounds interesting but it seems to require a key
Entries.Sat8: Hey @, was playing Journey of the Prairie King all night. The game is so difficult yet fun and addictive. Maybe come some day and I might be able to defeat it. $h
Entries.Sat10: Hey @, I've been grinding through Prairie King and been trying to beat it once and for all. It's going to be difficult but fun... Also, can you believe that some people actually got the Fector's Challenge achievement? $h#$e# Maybe you can come by sometime and we can get the achievement together! $h
Entries.Mon: Have you explored your farm entirely yet? It was a beautiful overgrown plot when I visited it a year ago... $h #$e# It was hard to navigate through though but it was peaceful for sure. I really like it! $h
Entries.Mon1: Great, I have online classes today... I've spent the whole night doing homework
Entries.Mon2: Mondays are the worst days... I'm still really tired. $s
Entries.Mon4: I heard there use to be a summit up north that you can access but an earthquake sealed the way ever since. Too bad... I would love to visit it $s
Entries.Mon5: $c 0.6#Hey, come to visit me? I was just practicing playing my flute. $h $b How's it going on the farm for you?#Hey, you come to visit me? Great, I was starting to get tired of playing my flute... $h
Entries.Mon8: Every day, my urge to explore the mines up north increases. I’ve been preparing for the day I finally go...but there’s no way my parents are going to let me. I understand that they’re just worried about me, but I feel like... like I’m going to explode from all the anticipation. #$e# Actually... shhh— don’t tell my parents this— but I have a sword hidden in one of my dresser drawers. It’s nothing too fancy though. Just a Steel Smallsword. I’ll get something better before I actually leave on an expedition.
Entries.Mon10: Hey, you're here! So nice to see you today! How's your farm? You must be growing something nice. $h #$e# $c 0.5#Have you grown a giant crop before? My mom managed to grow a giant pumpkin once. It was amazing and it survived for multiple seasons! $h $b What happened to it? Well you know, my dad harvested it and sold it off... ugh... all he cares about is the income and he says Joja is a greedy corporation # Have you grown a giant crop once. They say that a giant crop can last all seasons even winter! I found this out at class where I was reading an article about the giant crop discovery. It's pretty interesting stuff.
Entries.Tue_1: Hey @ #$b# Just wondering what I should do today.
Entries.Tue_2: $c 0.5#Hello @, Just wondering what I should do today.#What should I do today? $b  I will be gaming for most of the night for sure! $h
Entries.Tue4_1: Hey @, $b Just wondering what I should do today. $h
Entries.Tue4_2: $c 0.3#Hey @, $b Just wondering what I should do today. $h# On days like this, I usually just relax. I don't have much to do really...but I'm glad you're here!
Entries.Tue6: Watch out when you sell stuff directly to my dad. He sometimes claim it's his crops.#$e# ugh.. seriously, how greedy can he get...
Entries.Wed2: What happens when one dies? Who knows... *shrug*
Entries.Wed6: $c 0.5#I learned about reincarnation the other day... it's a pretty interesting myth... or is it a myth ? *shrugs*$h#Do you believe in reincarnation? Maybe I could become an elephant... or a guinea ping like David...$h
Entries.Thu: Almost the end of the week... woohoo!$h#$e# Let's hope I get less homework for this week.
Entries.Thu6: If I could travel back in time, I would like to be a viking... Wouldn't that be cool! $h#$e#...those adventures they have... and those slick viking helmets...$h

Entries.Sat1: Oh, hello. Sorry, I'm tired... was playing Journey of the Prairie King all night $neutral#$e#...what do you want? $neutral
Entries.Mon1: Great, I have classes today... $s #$e#Sorry, I don't want to talk right now, I've spent the night doing homework. $s

Entries.Mon5: $c 0.6#Hey, come to visit me? I was just practicing playing my flute. $h $b Do you ever practice playing the harp, you sounded great last time I heard you by the way! #Hey @, you come to visit me? Great, I was starting to get tired of playing my flute... $h

Entries.Thu10: You alright at your farm? Last time I saw it, I encountered quite a lot of monsters. Good thing I brought my trusty Steel Smallsword.# Anyways, it was an epic adventure! $h#$e# My parents? Well I never told them. If I did, they would kill me.

Entries.Sat6: Maybe I'm getting addicted playing Journey of the Prairie King. I'll probably do better if I take a break from it... hmm, Jumino Kart sounds interesting don't you think?

Maybe I'm getting addicted playing Journey of the Prairie King. I'll probably do better if I take a break from it... hmm, Jumino Kart sounds interesting don't you think? $b You're pretty good at it aren't you... the first one to beat it out of this town! $h

Entries.Sat10: Hey @, I've been grinding through Prairie King and been trying to beat it once and for all. It's going to be difficult but fun... Also, can you believe that some people actually got the Fector's Challenge achievement? $h#$e# Maybe you can come by sometime and we can get the achievement together! After all, you've already beaten it! $h

Entries.Saloon6: $c 0.5#Wow, you're pretty good with the joystick aren't you?! I'm impressed you have beaten both Prairie King and Junimo Kart. $b Maybe come by some time and help me up... $h#Hey, you're here! I'm going to try to beat a few levels in Prairie King. It's so cool that you've got an arcade machine after beating both games! I mean, I already have a console but the arcade machines are really nice. Maybe one day I'll be able to win one... $h

Changes.LogName: Abigail's Dialogue Interaction with Summit Access mods

Entries.Mon4: Have you visited the summit yet? It used to be closed off... #$e# I would love to explore it but I'm not allowed and I'm too busy. $s
